examples.english: I love my family.
She loves reading books.

examples.chinese: 爱是世界上最美好的感情。
examples.pinyin: Ài shì shìjiè shàng zuì měihǎo de gǎnqíng。
examples.english: Love is the most beautiful feeling in the world.
I like studying Chinese.

examples.chinese: 他们每天都在学习数学。
examples.pinyin: Tāmen měitiān dōu zài xuéxí shùxué。
examples.english: They study math every day.
Learning helps us grow.

examples.pinyin: Tā shì wǒ de hǎo péngyǒu。
examples.english: He is my good friend.

examples.chinese: 我们一起去看电影，成为了好朋友。
examples.pinyin: Wǒmen yìqǐ qù kàn diànyǐng, chéngwéi le hǎo péngyǒu。
examples.english: We went to the movies and became good friends.
Friends should help each other.

examples.pinyin: Wǒ měitiān hē hěn duō shuǐ。
examples.english: I drink a lot of water every day.

examples.pinyin: Chítáng lǐ de shuǐ hěn qīngchè。
examples.english: The water in the pond is very clear.
Water is the source of life.
He lost his phone.
I take pictures with my phone.
Please put your phone on silent.
I take the train to Beijing.
The train is delayed.
The train station is crowded.
Today's weather is excellent.

examples.chinese: 天气预报说明天会下雨。
examples.pinyin: Tiānqì yùbào shuō míngtiān huì xiàyǔ。
examples.english: The weather forecast says it will rain tomorrow.

examples.chinese: 寒冷的天气让人想呆在家里。
examples.pinyin: Hánlěng de tiānqì ràng rén xiǎng dāi zài jiālǐ。
examples.english: Cold weather makes people want to stay home.

examples.chinese: 这件衣服的价格太高了。
examples.pinyin: Zhè jiàn yīfú de jiàgé tài gāo le。
examples.english: The price of this shirt is too expensive.

examples.chinese: 市场上的价格随时在变化。
examples.pinyin: Shìchǎng shàng de jiàgé suíshí zài biànhuà。
examples.english: Prices in the market change constantly.

examples.chinese: 你能给我一个更低的价格吗？
examples.pinyin: Nǐ néng gěi wǒ yí gè gèng dī de jiàgé ma？
examples.english: Can you give me a lower price?
I go to school every morning.

examples.pinyin: Xuéxiào lǐ yǒu hěn duō lǎoshī。
examples.english: There are many teachers in the school.
The school's cafeteria food is delicious.

examples.pinyin: Tā shì yì míng wàikē yīshēng。
examples.english: He is a surgeon.

examples.pinyin: Yīshēng gěi wǒ kāi le yào。
examples.english: The doctor prescribed me medicine.
The doctor said I need to rest.
Let's go watch a movie.
This movie is very good.
Movie tickets are too expensive.
I like eating fruit.

examples.chinese: 这里有各种各样的水果。
examples.pinyin: Zhèlǐ yǒu gè zhǒng gè yàng de shuǐguǒ。
examples.english: They have all kinds of fruits here.
This fruit is very sweet.

examples.pinyin: Chāoshì shì yì zhǒng dàxíng shāngdiàn。
examples.english: A supermarket is a large store.
I go to the store to buy things.

examples.chinese: 这个商店不卖电子产品。
examples.pinyin: Zhège shāngdiàn bù mài diànzǐ chǎnpǐn。
examples.english: This store does not sell electronics.
I have an exam next week.

examples.pinyin: Kǎoshì hěn nán, wǒ xūyào fùxí。
examples.english: The exam is hard, I need to review.

examples.pinyin: Tā zài kǎoshì zhōng kǎo dé hěn hǎo。
examples.english: He did very well on the exam.
He works at the hospital.

examples.pinyin: Wǒ xūyào qù yīyuàn kàn yīshēng。
examples.english: I need to go to the hospital to see a doctor.

examples.chinese: 医院门口有很多救护车。
examples.pinyin: Yīyuàn ménkǒu yǒu hěn duō jiùhùchē。
examples.english: There are many ambulances in front of the hospital.
My teacher is very strict.
The teacher teaches us math.
The teacher is writing on the blackboard.

examples.pinyin: Wǒ mǎi le yì zhāng chēpiào。
examples.english: I bought a ticket.
How much is the ticket?

examples.pinyin: Qǐng bǎoguǎn hǎo nín de chēpiào。
examples.english: Please keep your ticket safe.
